name: ffmpeg
title: FFmpeg - View, Analyze and Manipulate
description: Use FFmpeg to view media file info
author: RenderCoder

commands.name: index
commands.title: File information & manipulation
commands.description: Use FFmpeg for view media file info

commands.name: convert-to
commands.title: Convert to
commands.description: Converts the video to any chosen format.

commands.name: extract-audio
commands.title: Extract Audio
commands.description: Extracts the audio from the video in the chosen format.

commands.name: trim
commands.title: Trim Video
commands.description: Trim the video to the chosen duration.
